CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Blue Gold Limited is a holding company formed to acquire and operate businesses within the gold mining and production sector. Through its wholly owned subsidiaries - such as Blue Gold Holdings Limited and Blue Gold (Cayman) Limited - the company focuses on gold exploration, extraction, and the development of mining projects in resource-rich geographies. It emphasizes sustainable and environmentally responsible mining practices. Blue Gold Limited was established as part of a business combination with Perception Capital Corp. IV, a SPAC, to facilitate public market access and drive growth in the global gold industry.
